headline: Boy Scouts Face Lawsuit Over Claims of Sex Abuse
abstract: The lawsuit was filed after a window was opened for survivors to pursue justice in cases of decades-old alleged abuse.
lead_paragraph: Eight men who say that they were sexually abused as children by Boy Scouts of America leaders sued the organization in Washington, D.C., on Monday, accusing it of failing to provide a safe environment and of covering up decades of sex abuse, a group of lawyers representing the men said in a statement.
